570:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahaśravaṇenaiva asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmadhimucyate nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate nāvatiṣṭhate na dhandhāyati na vicikitsati na kāṅkṣati,
570:4: bhagavānāha-yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahaśravaṇenaiva asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmadhimokṣyate nāvaleṣyate na saṃleṣyate nāvasthāsyate na dhandhāyiṣyati na vicikitsiṣyati na kāṅkṣiṣyati,
570:9: chandaṃ janayiṣyatyudgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayitum,
570:12: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte taruṇavatsā gaurnotsṛjati vatsam,
570:13: evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā tāvanna prahāsyati dharmabhāṇakaṃ yāvadasyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kāyagatā vā bhaviṣyati pustakagatā vā,
570:14: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manuṣyebhya eva cyuto manuṣyeṣvevopapannaḥ||
570:15: subhūtirāha-syādbhagavan etaireva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ?
570:16: bhagavānāha-syātsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo'nyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya paripṛcchya paripraśnīkṛtya tebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ,
570:18: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastuṣitebhyo devebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ,
570:20: yena maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paryupāsitaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ paripṛcchitaḥ paripraśnīkṛtaḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya,
570:22: yena khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śrutā,
570:25: tasya punarapi manuṣyeṣvevopapannasya asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvam,
570:31: tathā hi asyāṃ asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvam,
570:34: punaraparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattveneyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā pūrvāntato'pi śrutā bhavati,
570:35: paryupāsitā paripṛṣṭā paripṛcchitā paripraśnīkṛtā ca bhavati,
570:36: ekaṃ vā dinaṃ dve vā trīṇi vā catvāri vā pañca vā dināni,
570:41: evaṃ hyetatsubhūte bhavati-yena pūrvaṃ na saṃparipṛṣṭā bhavatīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
570:45: tasya kaṃcitkālaṃ chando'nuvartate asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śravaṇāya,
570:51: navena yānenāgataḥ sa bodhisattvastāṃ śraddhāṃ taṃ prasādaṃ taṃ chandaṃ prahāsyati,
570:52: yadutaināṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nānugrahīṣyati nānuvartiṣyate nānuparivārayiṣyati|
570:54: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte mahāsamudragatāyāṃ nāvi bhinnāyāṃ te tatra kāṣṭhaṃ vā na gṛhṇanti phalakaṃ vā,
570:57: ye khalu punaḥ subhūte mahāsamudragatāyāṃ nāvi bhinnāyāṃ tatra kāṣṭhaṃ vā gṛhṇanti phalakaṃ vā,
570:62: evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvaḥ śraddhāmātrakeṇa prasādamātrakeṇa premamātrakeṇa chandamātrakeṇa samanvāgataḥ sa ca prajñāpāramitāṃ nādhyālambate,
570:64: aprāpta eva sarvajñatāṃ śrāvakatve pratyekabuddhatve vā sthāsyatīti|
570:65: yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasti śraddhā,
570:81: evaṃ teṣāṃ sā śraddhā sā kṣāntiḥ sā rūciḥ sa cchandaḥ tadvīryaṃ so'pramādaḥ sādhimuktiḥ so'dhyāśayaḥ sa tyāgaḥ tadgauravaṃ sā prītiḥ tatprāmodyaṃ sa prasādaḥ tatprema sā anikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum|
570:82: te ca prajñāpāramitāṃ prāpya sarvajñatāyāṃ sthāsyanti|
570:83: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte strī va puruṣo vā aparipakvena ghaṭenodakaṃ parivahet,
570:90: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti rūciḥ asti chandaḥ asti vīryam astyapramādaḥ,
570:97: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca aparigṛhīto bhavati,
570:98: veditavyametatsubhūte ayaṃ bodhisattvo'ntarā vyadhvani vyavasādamāpatsyata iti|
570:99: kaśca subhūte bodhisattvasyāntarā vyadhvani vyavasādaḥ- śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā?
570:100: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā suparipakvena ghaṭena nadīto vā sarasto vā taḍāgato vā udapānādvā tato'nyebhyo vā udakādhārebhya udakaṃ parivahet,
570:101: tasya tadudakaṃ parivahato veditavyametatsubhūte svastinā anantarāyeṇa ayaṃ ghaṭo gṛhaṃ gamiṣyatīti|
570:104: evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti ruciḥ asti chandaḥ,
570:113: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto bhavati|
570:114: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'ntarā vyadhvani vyavasādamāpatsyate|
570:116: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte duṣprajñajātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ sāmudrikāṃ nāvamanākoṭitāmaparikarmakṛtāṃ cirabandhanabaddhāmudake'vatārya samāropitabhāṇḍāṃ paripūrṇāṃ bhārārtāmabhirūḍhaḥ syāt,
570:121: evaṃ sa sārthavāho'nupāyakuśalo dauṣprajñena mahatā arthaviyogena samanvāgato bhaviṣyati,
570:123: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ,
570:135: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati,
570:136: veditavyametatsubhūte aprāpta evāyaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñatāratnākaramantarā saṃsatsyati,
570:141: kā punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya antarā vyadhvani saṃsīdanā?
570:143: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte paṇḍitajātīyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ sāmudrikāṃ nāvaṃ subaddhāṃ bandhayitvā svākoṭitāmākoṭayitvā suparikarmakṛtāṃ kṛtvā udake'vatārya bhāṇḍamāropya pūrṇāṃ kṛtvā samaṃ yojayitvā yuktena vātenābhipretāṃ diśamanupūrveṇa gacchet,
570:147: mahālābhena cāyaṃ sārthavāhaḥ saṃyokṣyate yaduta laukikai ratnairiti|
570:148: evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti ruci chandaḥ asti vīryam,
570:157: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena cāvirahito bhavati,
570:158: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'ntarā vyadhvani saṃsatsyati,
570:162: evaṃ hyetatsubhūte bhavati-yato'sya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā,
570:176: ete cāsya dharmāḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītā upāyakauśalyena cāvirahitā na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā pratipatsyante|
570:178: tenaite dharmā abhimukhāḥ saṃprasthitāḥ tato'syā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāya bhaviṣyantīti|
570:179: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ saviṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā bhavet,
570:180: tasya kaścideva śarīre vyādhirutpadyeta vātato vā pittato vā śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā|
570:181: takiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣo'parigṛhīto mañcāduttiṣṭhet ?
570:185: sa tayā jarayā tena ca vyādhinā kṣapito yadyapi mañcāduttiṣṭhet,
570:187: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā,
570:201: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati,
570:203: atha ca punaḥ subhūte evaṃ veditavyam-ayaṃ bodhisattvo'ntarā vyadhvani saṃsatsyati,
570:205: yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā sthāsyatīti|
570:207: yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītatvādupāyakauśalyena ca virahitatvāt|
570:208: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sa eva puruṣo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ saviṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā bhavet,
570:209: tasya śarīre kaścideva vyādhirūtpadyeta vātato vā pittato vā śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā,
570:211: tamenaṃ dvau balavantau puruṣau vāmadakṣiṇābhyāṃ pārśvābhyāṃ svadhyālambitamadhyālambya suparigṛhītaṃ parigṛhya evaṃ vadetām-gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi yāvaccākāṅkṣasi gantum,
570:216: evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā,
570:231: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'ntarā vyadhvani saṃsatsyati,
